overview: Feeling unproductive?  Are you sure you’re trying hard enough?  Luckily, Ugly Bucket’s step by step guide will show you how to make the most of your time in lockdown  You will learn how to  Show off new skills Self-improve Stop making excuses And squeeze your creative juices to the very last drop ABC is a new short film that questions how far we’ll go to oblige the pressures of staying productive in lockdown.
title: ABC (Anything But Covid)
